current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for
		  coverage under the beneficiary travel program of the Department of Veterans
		  Affairs of certain disabled veterans for travel in connection with certain
		  special disabilities rehabilitation, and for other purposes.
